meanings.definition: Occurring by turns; succeeding each other in a regular order.
meanings.sent1: The alternant seasons of spring and autumn bring different colors to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The alternant days of work and rest help maintain a balanced routine.
meanings.sent3: The alternant pattern of stripes on the shirt made it look like a zebra!
meanings.sent4: The alternant rhythm of the music echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The alternant shades of blue in the painting created a calming effect.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that alternates with another.
meanings.sent1: In the relay race, each runner passed the baton to their alternant smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The alternant speaker took the stage after the first presenter finished.
meanings.sent3: The alternant flavors of chocolate and vanilla blended perfectly in the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The alternant waves crashing against the shore created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The alternant scenes in the movie kept the audience engaged till the end.
